# kong-gateway_oidc_jwk (Resource)

OidcJwk Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "kong-gateway_oidc_jwk" "my_oidcjwk" {
  id = "...my_id..."
  jwks = {
    keys = [
      {
        alg    = "...my_alg..."
        crv    = "...my_crv..."
        d      = "...my_d..."
        dp     = "...my_dp..."
        dq     = "...my_dq..."
        e      = "...my_e..."
        issuer = "...my_issuer..."
        k      = "...my_k..."
        key_ops = [
          "..."
        ]
        kid = "...my_kid..."
        kty = "...my_kty..."
        n   = "...my_n..."
        oth = "...my_oth..."
        p   = "...my_p..."
        q   = "...my_q..."
        qi  = "...my_qi..."
        r   = "...my_r..."
        t   = "...my_t..."
        use = "...my_use..."
        x   = "...my_x..."
        x5c = [
          "..."
        ]
        x5t             = "...my_x5t..."
        x5t_number_s256 = "...my_x5t_number_s256..."
        x5u             = "...my_x5u..."
        y               = "...my_y..."
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
